post_title: SOLD - Sherry Magee Portrait SC 150/30 - PSA 6(mc)
post_content:
For sale is a beautiful Sherry Magee SC 150/30 Portrait graded PSA 6(mc).  This card is razor sharp, $old pp ff which includes shipping.

Raw beaters of Magee portraits are going for $150-200+, guessing this won't last long.

Please PM if interested and thanks for looking.
